    • askUsePower

      public int askUsePower() throws TimeOutException
      This method waits for player to chose to use power or not and sends the answer to server
      Returns:
      Answer chosen by the player and sent to server
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

      public void playTimer​(boolean isChallenger, boolean isChoosingCard)
      This method starts the timer
      Parameters:
      isChallenger - This variable tells if it is the challenger timer
      isChoosingCard - This variable tells if it is the chosing card timer

      This method writes last turn story in the story pane
      Parameters:
      player - Name of last turn player
      chosenWorker - Position of chosen worker
      action - Action made by the player
      destination - Destination of the action
